casebody.data:
Jeffrey SIEGEL, Administrator of the Estate of Moustapha Akkad, Deceased, et al., petitioners,
v.
HYATT INTERNATIONAL (EUROPE, AFRICA, MIDDLE EAST) LLC, et al. No. 13-774. Supreme Court of the United States April 21, 2014.

Former decision, 134 S.Ct. 1324.

Petition for rehearing denied.
